data.title: Pearls From... Vol-XV
data.meta_description: Pearls from... Vol-XV.doc - Free ebook download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an introduction and summary of Allamah Muhammad Iqbal's epic poem "Javidnama". The introduction explains that Javidnama describes a spiritual journey inspired by the Prophet Muhammad's night journey, traveling through heavenly spheres to reach the divine presence. Arthur J. Arberry, the translator, provides biographical context on Iqbal's life and career as a poet, philosopher, and politician. He describes Iqbal as the spiritual founder of Pakistan and writes that Javidnama is considered Iqbal's magnum opus, dealing with the conflict of the soul and the path to glory and peace. The document concludes by praising Javidnama as a masterpiece that will rank among the great works
